form.p:
To check for updates for features you have installed, go to the My Eclipse 1 and select Available Updates folder. Search page will be shown allowing you to initiate and customize the search. Now we will add an
image here. Just to show how wrapping should apply to images when they are larger than the regular text.
New addition: controls in the text
Now we will show an image link:
And this is image and text as a link: Some link text
form.li: To check for updates for features you have installed, go to the My Eclipse 2 and select Available Updates folder. Search page will be shown allowing you to initiate and customize the search.
